Pregnant Women
What is the risk to pregnant women of getting COVID-19? Is it easier for
pregnant women to become ill with the disease? If they become
infected, will they be more sick than other people?
We do not currently know if pregnant women have a greater chance of getting sick from COVID-
19 than the general public nor whether they are more likely to have serious illness as a result.
